product_name: Mountain Hardwear Swift Flex Cap II - Men's
long_description: Providing coverage from sunny skies plus cooling comfort, the Mountain Hardwear Swift Flex Cap II helps keep you comfortable during warm-weather runs whether your goal is 5 miles or 50. Forehead panel and interior sweatband feature Cool Q.(TM) ZERO stretch-polyester; fabric is specially formulated to provide an ongoing cooling sensation. Soft-shell stretch-nylon fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly; cap also resists abrasion and is water repellent. UPF 50+ sun protection. Mountain Hardwear Swift Flex Cap II features an adjustable rear closure with buckle.
short_description: Providing coverage from sunny skies plus cooling comfort, the Mountain Hardwear Swift Flex Cap II helps keep you comfortable during warm-weather runs whether your goal is 5 miles or 50.
